sections.description: Shiprocket WooCommerce Integration provides real-time shipping rates and pincode serviceability check for your WooCommerce store using the official Shiprocket API.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.6

  • Enhanced plugin functionality and performance improvements
  • Updated to latest Shiprocket API standards
  • Improved error handling and user experience
  • Better caching mechanism for optimal performance

Previous Versions

  • See full changelog on GitHub releases page

upgrade_notice: Important update: Version 1.0.6 includes enhanced functionality and improved performance. Update recommended for all users.
